code: import{cond,defined,set,add,min,max}from"../base";import AnimatedValue from"../core/InternalAnimatedValue";import diff from"./diff";export default function diffClamp(a,minVal,maxVal){var value=new AnimatedValue();return set(value,min(max(add(cond(defined(value),value,a),diff(a)),minVal),maxVal));}
